name: Event Participation Report
query:
SELECT
    name AS "Participant ID:Link/Participant:150",
    full_name AS "Full Name:Link/User Profile1:200",
    events AS "Event:Link/Events:200",
    email AS "Email:Data:200",
    status AS "Status:Select:100",
    certificate_issued AS "Certificate Issued:Check:120",
    creation AS "Created On:Datetime:150"
FROM
    `tabParticipant`
ORDER BY
    events, creation DESC
